Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute at Roosevelt/St. Louis
ShortDescription: 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Central Park, Douglass, Homan and Roosevelt: due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/St. Louis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Central Park, Douglass, Homan and Roosevelt: due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/St. Louis.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 69th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at 69th.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
